name: places/ChIJqXuY1VhYwokRM_OBO58tUsE
formattedAddress: 425 W 59th St #6c, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 425 W 59th St #6c, New York, NY 10019-8022, USA

originalText.text: Lost month and never got my ultrasound. They cancelled twice my appointments: first time when I was at the medical center, next time - few hours before the appointment.

text.text: Lost month and never got my ultrasound. They cancelled twice my appointments: first time when I was at the medical center, next time - few hours before the appointment.

originalText.text:
After hours on the phone bring shuffled from one office to another, me being on the verge of tears, a woman named Emma answered the phone at 425 W 59th Radiology. She was the ultimate professional. After explaining the frustrations that I had, trying to locate my husband‘s records, with one short, confident phrase she said:” I can do that!”  Instantaneously, she found the records, faxed them
to Langone, created a disk of my husband’s imagery, which she gave to me to accompany the materials  sent to Langone earlier. She accomplished the  task efficiently, calmly and professionally. Emma, thank you.

originalText.text: My appointment was for 9:30a. I got in a little after 9a. I was out by 9:13a for a spine X-ray. They were courteous, clean and professional. Excellent!

text.text: My appointment was for 9:30a. I got in a little after 9a. I was out by 9:13a for a spine X-ray. They were courteous, clean and professional. Excellent!

originalText.text: NEVER go here. I am warning you. I showed up for my appointment early and was told that the radiologists had decided to not come in that day. What sort of practice is this? Then, they billed me for the appointment anyway and I was unable to get the MRI performed by a superior provider after they requested it. This practice has caused so much distress and wasted hours of my life. I am warning you now so that the same thing doesn’t happen to you. A terrible practice that has no care for peoples welfare or safety.

originalText.text:
I had an xray of my foot done in the doctors office. In every other doctor's office at every hospital, I would have left with a CD of my images and a report on the hospital portal a day later.

nobody in the doctor's office was willing to give me a cd. they said it would be mailed to my provider. 2 weeks later, nobody has received any imaging. all I get is excuses about images not being released and no contact provided to follow up further. Everyone but the doctor is totally RUDE.

This is so frustrating and unnecessary. get your radiology done at the always reliable Lenox Hill Radiology.
